CustomField.description: shows a visual icon that indicates the renewal status of the Contract
CustomField.formula: IF( End_of_Contract__c, IMAGE("/resource/RedCross", "Red Cross"), IF( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "New"), IMAGE("/resource/BlueStar", "Blue Star"), IF( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active"), IF( (Review_Date__c - TODAY()) > 30, /*More than month to*/ IMAGE("/resource/GreenTick", "Green Tick"), IF( AND( (Review_Date__c - TODAY()) < 30,/*less than a month to*/ (Review_Date__c - TODAY()) > 0), IMAGE("/resource/AmberStar", "Amber Star"), IF( Review_Date__c < TODAY(), /*review date passed*/ IMAGE("/resource/Triangle", "Triangle with an exclamation mark"), "" ) ) ), "" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Contract Review Due?
